hero_text: Metaesthetics represents the convergence of cutting-edge AI and expert clinical care, creating a revolutionary platform that transforms aesthetic medicine from disconnected treatments into personalized beauty journeys.
resources_clinic_text: Transform your practice with our comprehensive clinic integration guide.
resources_patient_text: Experience the future of personalized beauty care through our innovative app.
features_analysis_text: Discover your unique beauty archetype through submillimeter precision analysis
features_matching_text: Connect with specialists perfectly matched to your aesthetic goals
features_journey_text: Experience a perfectly coordinated beauty journey from start to finish
signup_subtitle_patient: Be among the first to experience personalized beauty
signup_consent_text: I agree to receive updates about Metaesthetics
signup_success_patient: Thank you! You've secured your place on our exclusive waitlist.
signup_success_clinic: Thank you! Our team will contact you about partnership opportunities.
signup_error_validation: Please fill in all required fields.
signup_error_submit: There was an error submitting the form. Please try again.
testimonial_1_quote: The AI analysis was incredibly accurate. It helped me achieve exactly the look I wanted.
testimonial_2_quote: Our clinic has seen a 40% increase in patient satisfaction since partnering with Metaesthetics.
contact_info_text: Have questions about Metaesthetics? Our team is ready to help answer your inquiries and provide the information you need.
contact_info_follow_text: Follow us on social media for the latest updates
contact_form_subtitle: We'll get back to you as soon as possible
contact_form_success: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you soon.
contact_form_error_submit: Sorry, there was an error submitting your message. Please try again.
modal_privacy_p_collection: We collect and process your personal data to provide our beauty analysis and matching services. This includes:
modal_privacy_p_protection: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the security of your personal data. Your data is:
modal_privacy_p_rights: Under applicable data protection laws, you have the right to:
modal_privacy_li_object: Object to processing of your data
modal_privacy_p_contact: For any privacy-related questions or requests, please contact our Data Protection Officer at privacy@metaesthetics.com
modal_terms_p_acceptance: By accessing or using Metaesthetics services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you may not access our services.
modal_terms_li_confidential: Maintain the confidentiality of their account
modal_terms_li_compliance: Use the service in compliance with applicable laws
modal_terms_li_misuse: Not misuse or attempt to manipulate our systems
modal_terms_p_providers: Healthcare providers using our platform must:
modal_terms_li_accurate_clinic: Provide accurate clinic and service information
modal_terms_li_regulations: Comply with medical and privacy regulations
modal_terms_li_accuracy_ai: Accuracy of AI analysis (for reference only)
modal_terms_p_changes: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of updated terms.
